content: Turtle Treasure's Spirit allows you to take the beast's form and leap up into the air before slamming your massive mallet down onto the ground, creating a fiery explosion that deals epic damage to any enemies unfortunate enough to get caught underneath it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Treasure_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Treasure Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Treasure Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Turtle Treasure's Spirit allows you to take the beast's form and leap up into the air before slamming your massive mallet down onto the ground, creating a fiery explosion that deals epic damage to any enemies unfortunate enough to get caught underneath it.
